Package org.aslib

Interface Admin

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
public interface Admin extends Remote
The Admin interface defines administrative actions in the auction service. It allows the creation of users, items, and auctions, and provides access to user, item, and auction data.

      User createUser(String login, String password) throws RemoteException
      Creates a new user with the specified login and password.
      Parameters:
      login - the login name of the user
      password - the password of the user
      Returns:
      the created User object
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • createAuction

      Auction createAuction(Item item, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end) throws RemoteException
      Creates a new auction with the specified item and start/end times.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to be auctioned
      start - the start time of the auction
      end - the end time of the auction
      Returns:
      the created Auction object
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

      Parameters:

      start - the start time of the auction
      end - the end time of the auction

      the created Auction object
